nodes.text: Verkoss was a male Trandoshan, who worked as an enforcer for Brinojja the Hutt during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Verkoss was the leader of Brinojja's thugs and in 3 ABY, the Hutt sent them to Nar Shaddaa, to capture the information broker Rat. However, a group of Rebel Alliance agents also wanted to speak with Rat and they became involved in a firefight with Verkoss and his thugs. Eventually, the Alliance agents were able to run off with Rat in their custody, leaving Verkoss empty-handed.
